title: Chicken, halloumi and green chilli spring roll with carrot and raisin yoghurt salad
description: This dish makes a great dinner party starter. Serve on a large plater with the salad on the side for sharing.
ingredients: 3 small green chillies, seeds removed and sliced ﬁnely
16 sheets of filo pastry, each 10cm/4in x 10cm/4in
salt and freshly ground black pepper
